title: Dear Diary
description: Chris Bishop is an All-American type guy with the perfect family, perfect grades and perfect girlfriend, with a bright and shiny future ahead of him. He thought he had everything planned, thought he knew it all. But one summer, a kiss, and green eye hunk changed his whole life. Volunteering in a law firm was an opportunity for his future but it took him in a direction he never thought of or dreamt could happen.
author: Allison Cassatta
